name: Rawbot
description:
Rawbot is game where you try to find the end of a maze-like level. But to get there you first have to unlock the hidden parts of the maze! And there are several other robots which will try to prevent you doing that.

In order to get "rid" of those robots you are free to use:

- Picking up Weapons from the ground 
- Picking up Weapons from other robots you've destroyed

Or be oldschool and grab your left arm. Yes - you can use your left arm to get the enemies down. 

Some rumors say: "friendly fire" is active. Placing yourself well can also help ;-)

---------

This game was made for the quarantine jam. So: stay at home and stay healthy!
